entry.title: Tuesday: Near blizzard. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Near blizzard ending this morning then mainly sunny. Blowing snow late this morning and this afternoon. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 52 this morning and minus 43 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 47 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 28. POP 60%
